name: The Blues Brothers
overview: The greatest rock'n'roll game is about to begin... THE BLUES BROTHERS Back by popular demand, the Blues Brothers are here to play the blues. Cruise along with Jake and Elwood, those all-time rhythm'n'blues stars in this exciting platform game - an explosive mix of adventure, comedy and great music. On the way to their first concert, they get trapped by an evil Jukebox... You'll have to fly across the countryside, survive electrical chaos, escape from spooky sewers and defeat deadly enemies to reach Chicago in time to prepare the greatest concert in history. - 1 and 2-player simultaneous action. The most exciting 2-player platform game ever. - Includes music performed by the Blues Brothers. - Use the power of your Super Records and the Super Blues bonus to defeat hordes of aggressive enemies. - 34 challenging levels in 1-player mode, and 25 breathtaking levels in the 2-player mode. GET READY TO PLAY THE BLUES!
